Magic

Spells:
Alter Self (Scaled Soul2 Tran): Self becomes small (+2 Dexterity) or medium (+2 Strength) humanoid for 20 min
Beast Shape III (Scaled Soul5 Tran): Self becomes diminutive (+6 Dexterity, -4 Strength, +1 AC) or huge (+6 Strength, -4 Dexterity, +6 AC) animal or small (+4 Dexterity, +2 AC) or medium (+4 Strength, +4 AC) magical beast for 20 min
Creeping Doom (Den Of Vipers7 Conj): R75' 10 centipede swarms inflict 2d6 HP plus poison, obey self for 20 rd
Delay Poison (Bloodline Serpentine2 Conj): Touched gains immunity to poison for 20 hr
Dominate Monster (Bloodline Serpentine9 Ench): R75' Target obeys self thoughts (DC 22 Will neg) for 20 dy
Hold Monster (Bloodline Serpentine5 Ench): R300' Immobilizes target (DC 18 Will neg) for 20 rd
Hypnotism (Bloodline Serpentine1 Ench): R75' Fascinates and makes suggestible 2d4 HD of creatures in 15' radius (DC 14 Will neg, +2 during combat, -2 single target) for 2d4 rd
Irresistible Dance (Bloodline Serpentine8 Ench): Touched dances (-4 AC, -10 Reflex) for d4+1 rd (DC 21 Will for 1 rd)
Mass Suggestion (Bloodline Serpentine6 Ench): R300' 20 targets in 15' radius follow reasonable suggestion (DC 19 Will neg) for 20 hr
Poison (Bloodline Serpentine4 Necr): Touched suffers -1d3 Constitution/rd for 6 rd (DC 18 Fort neg)
Speak With Animals (Serpentfriend1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 20 min
Summon Monster III (Bloodline Serpentine3 Conj): R75' 1 3rd-, 1d3 2nd-, or 1d4+1 1st-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Summon Monster VII (Bloodline Serpentine7 Conj): R75' 1 7th-, 1d3 6th-, or 1d4+1 lower-level creatures appear and fight foes for 20 rd
Magic Notes:
Charisma Sorcerer Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level S1, S2, S3
Spell Focus (Necromancy): +1 Spell DC (Necromancy)
Bloodline Serpentine: May affect animals, magical beasts, and monstrous humanoids with mind-affecting and language-dependent spells
Craft Wand: May create wands for up to 4th level spell
Den Of Vipers: May use Creeping Doom effects w/serpents that inflict Con damage and entanglement 1/dy
Ectoplasmic Spell: May cast spell targeting incorporeal or ethereal target; uses +1 spell slot
Elemental Spell (Acid): May convert half or all spell damage to acid damage; uses +1 spell slot
Eschew Materials: May cast spells w/out materials
Expanded Arcana: +1 spells known, or +2 of lower than max level
Scaled Soul: May use Alter Self or Beast Shape III effects to assume form of reptilian humanoid or snake at will
Serpentfriend: May use Speak With Animals at will with reptiles
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Companions
Familiar: Viper "Goafru"
Str: 4 (-3) Dex: 17 (+3) Con: 8 (-1) Int: 14 (+2) Wis: 13 (+1) Cha: 2 (-4) Size: T Speed: 20
HD/HP: 20/55 Init: +3 AC: 25 Attack: +15 1d2-2 CMB/CMD: +11/18 Fort/Ref/Will: +5/+9/+13
Familiar Features: Companion Alertness; Companion Evasion; Companion Improved Evasion; Companion Spell Resistance; Deliver Touch Spells; Empathic Link; Scry On Familiar; Share Spells; Speak With Like Animals; Speak With Master
Companion Notes:
Companion Evasion: Reflex save yields no damage instead of half
Companion Improved Evasion: Failed Reflex save yields half damage
Deliver Touch Spells: May deliver touch spells if in contact w/master when cast
Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile
Scry On Familiar: Master may view companion 1/dy
Share Spells: Master may share self spell w/adjacent companion
Speak With Like Animals: May talk w/similar creatures
Speak With Master: May talk w/master in secret language
